item.description:
In lieu of my recent trip to Los Angeles, I noticed that Hollywood hasn't been much of what it has been portrayed to be in previous years....

By this, I mean: we don't see classic beauties "roaming" the streets, nor do we see the lady-like style and glamour that has made this an iconic city for fashion.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Our next meet-up shall include some lovely themes inspired by Hollywood icons, such as :

Marilyn Monroe, Audrey Hepburn, Brigitte Bardot, Elizabeth Taylor,and so forth...

 

 

As stylists at Robert's Salon and Spa, we would like to pay homage to our icons of inspiration.

 

 

We would like to celebrate and create art in honor and inspiration of these ladies  :)

 

Here is a photo of model Kayla channeling her inner Brigit Bardot:

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Models: Miss Baystate 2012 Emma Gilbert, Kayla Caulfield, Randi Boice, Caitlin, Suzanne, Colleen C, Shannon B, Jennifer, Ashley, and Nastaran (keep in mind they are subject to change)

Please arrive promptly at 12:00pm for hair and make up.

Please communicate with REVOLVE to schedule another fitting:

59 Leonard Street Belmont MA 02478

617.484.7900

MONDAY thru SATURDAY

9:30 AM - 7:00 PM

SUNDAY12:00 PM - 5:00 PM

Photographers: Please arrive around 2:45-3:00 pm.

The manager of Patou Thai Restaurant has requested that there not be many large equipment for lighting around 4pm. This is a time where many clients enter the restaurant for dinner. We do not want there to be an inconvenience to the workers or restaurant goers while they're trying to enjoy their meal ! :)

There are interesting spaces at the restaurant including: colored, patterned benches, a candlelit section with brick wall cut out, patio and basic seating:).

The Salon is also open for shooting where several stations can be arranged as before (2500 square feet).

There is also a cool alley way (see photos from "Dollhouse Shoot").

 

Hairstylists: Amanda, Colleen, Ashley M., Elizabeth B., Mary Jane D.

MUA: Maria Bartolemeau and Nastaran Sharifi

 

 

Coffee and Refreshments will be served.

**** a second location (across the street) will accommodate photographers and models. It is a very beautiful, ambient thai restaurant that provides lovely natural lighting. It is called PATOU THAI.

 

There are some rules however for the use of this premisis for photographing. Large equipment is not permitted (so as not to cause inconvenience to clients) and the area is only available from 3:00pm-4:30pm. This is a very nice location as it has natural lighting, a patio with a beautiful yellow fence, tables with candlelight for models to pose as well as an ambient setting with lanterns.

See you guys there ! :)

 

There will be no strobe lighting setup for this photoshoot:

1) At the Salon - from the previous photoshoot, I found that the lighting at the salon is fine without additional strobe lighting. You could use fill light with your camera flash.

2) At the PATOU THAI restaurant - since we only have from 3:00 PM - 4:30 PM. I do not think we have enough time to setup softbox lighting at this location. I suggest to use your camera flash for this location.

Note:

I will bring one hot-light and will decide where to put it when I am there.

ichi.
item.name: Old Time Hollywood Glamour Shoot
